My types

I took some Pokémon type quizzes and these are the results.

Ice-types are quiet and introverted, like to go unnoticed, and may appear cold to others, but secretly harbor a lot of passion and creativity. (via The Cave of Dragonflies)

Fire-type

You have the passion to be the very best! A Fire-type Pokémon is what you should become. Pick from your favorite Fire-type Pokémon to start your adventure in Pokémon Super Mystery Dungeon. (via Play Nintendo)
